/*
**
**  Octeract software uses third-party open-source libraries. 
**
**  For each library, the following are provided: 
**    1. The url where you can download the source code, and compile the shared library. 
**    2. The text file (located in this folder) where you can find their license details. 
**
*/


SYMENGINE
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the SymEngine library obtainable from their github repository: 

    https://github.com/symengine/symengine

Their license agreement details can be found in SYMENGINE_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


FILIB++
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the FILIB++ library obtainable from their website:

    http://www2.math.uni-wuppertal.de/wrswt/software/filib.html
    
Their license agreement falls under the LGPL agreement - the details can be found in FILIB_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BLCR
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the BLCR library obtainable from their website:

    https://crd.lbl.gov/departments/computer-science/CLaSS/research/BLCR/

Their license agreement falls under the LGPL agreement - the details can be found in BLCR_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


GMP  
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the GMP library obtainable from their website:

     https://gmplib.org/

Their license agreement falls under the LGPL agreement - the details can be found in GMP_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

QUADMATH
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the QUADMATH library obtainable as part of the gcc package: 
    
    https://gcc.gnu.org/releases.html

Their license agreement falls under the LGPL agreement - the details can be found in QUADMATH_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


MPICH 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the MPFR library obtainable from their website: 

    https://www.mpich.org/

Their license agreement details can be found in MPICH_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


BOOST 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the Boost C++ library obtainable from their website: 

    https://www.boost.org/

Their license agreement details can be found in BOOST_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


COIN-OR 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes several coin-or libraries, including bonmin, ipopt, cbc, clp and osilp, all of which 
are obtainable from the COIN-OR github repository: 

    https://github.com/coin-or/

These libraries are released under the Eclipse Public License (EPL), the details of which can be found 
in ECLIPSE_PUBLIC_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


PYTHON 3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the python 3 libraries, obtainable from:

    https://www.python.org/downloads/source/

Their license agreement fall under the PSF LICENSE AGREEMENT, the details of which can be found in 
PYTHON_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


CURL
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Octeract includes the Curl libraries, obtainable from:

    https://curl.se/libcurl/

Their license agreement fall under the curl license, the details of which can be found in 
CURL_LICENSE.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
